original: Araṇo appaccayo dhammo nasaraṇassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇaḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Araṇo asaṅkhato dhammo nasaraṇassa naasaṅkhatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇaḥ asaṅkhataḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na asaṅkhatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Araṇo sanidassano dhammo naaraṇassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: araṇaḥ sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na araṇassa na sa nidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Araṇo sanidassano dhammo nasaraṇassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ araṇaḥ sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na sa raṇassa na sa nidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve.
analyzed: ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā eka upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve
